chips: .NET 6/8 | API | Microservices | Distributed Systems | Background services
description: This area is my core expertise, mostly focused on designing and evolving API-oriented microservices within the .NET ecosystem, contributing to architectural decisions and continuous improvements. I have worked with core .NET libraries and common ecosystem tooling.
Performance optimization and API design are the areas where I am most confident.

Comfortable working in containerized environments, with hands-on experience in CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps, Jenkins, and GitHub Actions, supporting deployment workflows across multiple environments.
I have practical experience with Kubernetes deployment configurations, understanding and operating production setups.

In Azure, I have worked with App Services, SQL and NoSQL databases, Redis caching, Azure Service Bus, Functions, and related cloud services. I have also configured monitoring dashboards and worked with observability stacks including Grafana, Prometheus, Jaeger, and centralized logging solutions such as Graylog to support distributed systems.

I have some practical experience in web and mobile development, but it is not my strongest skill. I usually deliver frontend features including UI components, state management, and API integrations, typically extending existing architectures while collaborating effectively as a backend-focused engineer.

chips: Unit Testing | Integration Testing | Load Testing | Performance Testing | K6
